ComicInfo.Title: Ask Any Mermaid; Another Sleepless Knight; I Think I'll Keep Her; Everything You Want, Nothing You Don't; Never Let Him Forget He's a Man; Share the Fantasy
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ask Any Mermaid: The sole survivor of a spacewreck is rescued by his fantasy woman. He finds that she is more than a fantasy, but only half a woman.
Another Sleepless Knight: At Land-O-Nod, dream enhancement parlor, Virgil likes to play warrior, but he better watch out for his violent end.
I Think I'll Keep Her: A ship's 'brain' falls in love with his science officer and finds he can touch her through the alien creature she's been studying.
Everything You Want, Nothing You Don't: So much of life is lived in the mind. Fantasy enhanced by virtual reality is the only cure for the hum-drum of life.
Never Let Him Forget He's a Man: The battle of the sexes is something quite different for these three-sexed beings of the future.
Share the Fantasy: Virtual reality phone sex.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 15:35:57. [Issue ID 328829]
